pages.text: Some farms that I would call a bit cheating 'exploit' game mechanics that weren't actually meant for that. $(br2)The first variant of this would be to use $(thing)Entity Cramming$() to kill mobs out of nowhere. $(br)$(li)Entity Cramming has been implemented to prevent lag, if too many entities are in one spot it will cause the oldest one to be killed. $(br)$(li)The maximum number is by default $(thing)24$(). But it can be changed with this command: $(thing)/gamerule maxEntityCramming [number]
